```{r}
library(tidyverse)

source("http://www.openintro.org/stat/data/cdc.R")
cdc <- as_tibble(cdc)

ggplot(data=cdc) +
  geom_jitter(mapping = aes(x = weight, y = height, color= gender)) 

```



```{r}
library(tidyverse)

source("http://www.openintro.org/stat/data/cdc.R")
cdc <- as_tibble(cdc)

ggplot(data=cdc) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = weight, y = wtdesire, color= gender)) 
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = cdc, mapping = aes(x = as.factor(smoke100), color = gender, fill = gender)) +
  geom_bar() +
  xlab("Response") +
  scale_x_discrete(labels = c("No", "Yes"))
```
